parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake caliper can cause the vehicle to pull to one side, lose power, and experience abnormal wear on brake pads, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The brake caliper seizes or sticks

causing intense heat to the rotor and distorting the caliper; the parking brake fails to release or sticks; the vehicle pulls to one side; abnormal wear on brake pads; overheating of the rotor; imbalance while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brake caliper can cause the parking brake to stick, resulting in very hot rear wheels, and potentially leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The rear brake caliper seizes or sticks; the parking brake fails to release or sticks; the rear wheels overheat; the vehicle experiences abnormal wear on brake pads.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake rotor can cause the vehicle to experience overheating, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The brake rotor overheats; the brake rotor fails; the vehicle experiences brake chatter and insufficient braking action.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling can cause loss of control, accidents, and leave the driver stranded, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Engine stalls while driving
engine shuts down
vehicle loses power
engine cannot be restarted immediately.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine knocking noise can indicate underlying engine problems, potentially leading to engine failure, loss of power, and accidents.
symptoms: Engine makes a knocking noise
especially when cold
due to carbon buildup in the combustion chamber.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine oil sending unit malfunction can cause engine failure, leading to loss of power, accidents, and costly repairs.
symptoms: Oil sending unit malfunction
recommended engine replacement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cam sensor failure can cause engine problems, leading to loss of power, accidents, and costly repairs.
symptoms: Cam sensor failed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water ingress into the engine can cause engine failure, leading to loss of power, accidents, and costly repairs.
symptoms: Water entered the engine
causing it to blow a rod and crack the block.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front coil spring can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, and may also result in damage to surrounding components, such as tires and struts.
symptoms: Loud noise or popping sound while driving
squeaking or groaning noise when hitting bumps
front coil spring breaks or bursts
vehicle shaking or vibrating
steering wheel locks up
tire blowout.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower ball joint can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, and may also result in damage to surrounding components, such as tires and steering systems.
symptoms: Steering wheel locks up
loud noise or popping sound while driving
need to replace ball joints repeatedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle suddenly veers off course, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to one side without the steering wheel being turned
the vehicle turns without the driver's input
the vehicle's steering sticks and needs to be pulled back around.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the power steering system can cause loss of control, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The power steering fails
especially upon deceleration
making it hard to steer the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The security system's failure to disarm can cause inconvenience and potentially lead to unauthorized access to the vehicle.
symptoms: The security system fails to disarm after unlocking the driver's side door
but disarms after unlocking the passenger's side door.
